replies.body:
Help me too. 10 ranked losses in a row. Thankfully Plat 5 is hard to fall out of.

Think I have like a 4-15 record since hitting Plat
Don't let it phase you, i hit gold and had a massive amount of losses shortly thereafter, right now i'm sitting at 13-22 from 6-14 in the 20 games since i joined gold.

As silly as this may sound, just chill, play some normal's/custom games and just work on your game in a stress free environment.
I found myself in a similar situation for the past week and im still in a bit of a bad spot,playing so/so in normal's, once i get my rhythm back 5+ wins in a row or a 75% w/l ratio ill take a step back in and see how I go.  Until then I suggest working on fundamentals and your mechanics in a stress free zone and have a bit of fun :)

> it makes me jealous because I get tilt in normal mode...

thats really sad m8

Whenever a ranked person talks about tilt, it makes me jealous because I get tilt in normal mode...

I just stop playing LoL and switch to something more casual like sudoku or terraria. Because AI is stressfully boring and I don't have any lesser-difficulty game modes to switch to.
